about.details:
Founded in January 2020, Lamosaic India Limited trades various products, including flush doors, decorative laminates, acrylic sheets, printing paper (base), and plywood. In September 2023, the company expanded its operations into manufacturing by setting up a workshop in Chembur, Mumbai, covering an area of approximately 650 sq. ft.

The range of products sold under the brand name "Lamosaic" is summarized as under:

  • Flush Doors
  • Decorative Laminates
  • Acrylic Sheets
  • Printing Paper (Base)
  • Plywood

The company offers customized solutions for its customers, including the design of laminates and acrylic sheets. Additionally, the company manufactures and supplies laminated and decorative flush doors based on customer orders. The company's business operations, including trading and manufacturing, are currently conducted within Maharashtra. In addition to selling products directly in the market, the company also distribute through a franchise located in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

Competitive Strength

  • Strong Network of Dealer, Distributors, Stockiest and Wholesalers.
  • Experienced Management team
  • Redesign products that are suitable for the Indian market with the assistance of in-house designers.

As of September 30 2024, the company has nine employees and 23 unskilled labourers.

faqs.question: What is the Lamosaic India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Lamosaic India IPO is a SME IPO of 3060000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹61.20 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹200 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on November 21, 2024, and closes on November 26, 2024.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Lamosaic India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Lamosaic India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Lamosaic India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Lamosaic India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Lamosaic India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Lamosaic India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Lamosaic India IPO opens on November 21, 2024 and closes on November 26, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Lamosaic India IPO?
faqs.answer: Lamosaic India IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Lamosaic India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Lamosaic India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Lamosaic India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Lamosaic India IPO will be done on Wednesday, November 27, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, November 28, 2024. Check the Lamosaic India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Lamosaic India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Lamosaic India IPO listing date is on Friday, November 29, 2024.
